title_advert: ['Corner unit ground floor below market price']
location1: ['UrbanaDubai, Dubai South (Dubai World Central), EMAAR South']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nMaids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to be able to offer this three bedroom ground floor corner unit in Urbana 1, Emaar South.
With handover due very soon, this property offers amazing value for an end user or an investor alike.  Being located in Emaar South, the location is very convenient for not only Dubai World Central airport but also the Expo 2020 site. Furthermore, the location is perfect for those people needing to commute to Abu Dhabi yet retaining a Dubai residency and lifestyle.
The properties in Urbana are unique to this development and the first of its kind in Dubai.  They are stacked town homes meaning that they are like apartments however they are only on two floors.  There are many benefits to this including lower service fees and also the community has the lifestyle of a conventional villa community with pool and parks.
The accommodation comprises an entrance foyer, spacious living room/dining room/open kitchen, the master bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, two further bedrooms and a shared family bathroom.
Outside there is a good space with an area of garden to the rear of the property and covered parking to the front.  This property has the unique benefit of enjoying a corner plot which gives much more privacy than a normal type of location.
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae for further information.']

With bespoke black hardware and concealed appliances, the spacious contemporary apartment receives lots of daylight with vast balconies.
Live with Downtown style in Jumeirah village Circle bordered by Al Khail Road , Hessa Street and Emirates Highway and a quick trip from Downtown Dubai, the Marina, JLT and 10minutes from beach or Emirates Golf Club.

descriptions:
['DescriptionA stunning find in a spectacular project by Meraas. This 1BR is located on a high floor in one of the best buildings in Bluewaters.
Located in Building 7, which is one of the buildings directly framing Ain Dubai, with full, open views of the sea and right on the main retail and F & B area of Bluewaters Island.
Secure a property in Dubai s latest mega-project that is the city island retreat right off JBR. This is a great investment opportunity to purchase exclusive, luxury real estate within a world-class entertainment district. As an end-user, you will own an extremely liquid asset, that will be ready to sell or put up for lease at any time.
What makes Bluewaters Island such a great project to invest in?
It is a federal project that hosts the largest observation in the world! Only 10 residential buildings have been developed on the island, which makes the project very unique, limited and desirable. The low and controlled supply of residences increases the value of your investment here, along with access to 200 retail & dining concepts on the island, the world-famous Caesars Palace and direct pedestrian crossing to JBR.
This brand-new 1BR that comes with:
* Open plan, modern living space
* Floor-to-ceiling windows for full sea views and natural sunlight
* Bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms
* Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances
* Fine finishing with wooden flooring, soft metallic fixtures, Italian sanitary ware and minimalistic style
* Private parking
* Three modes of transport into and out of the island, with direct SZR access!
As a Bluewaters specialist I can also show you a number of properties available in this incredible project by Meraas. A developer well-known for bringing creative living concepts to life.
Call now for more information on the best option for island living in the middle of the city!
fäm Properties 
 Contact Us - +97142483661
 Toll free: 800fam800 800326800) 
 Email: cc@famproperties.com
 Visit our website: famproperties.com']
